# removeAccessoryController(_:)

**Instance Method**

Removes the specified controller of an accessory view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func removeAccessoryController(_ accessoryController: NSViewController)
```

## Parameters

- **accessoryController**: The controller to remove.

## Customizing the page setup dialog

- **addAccessoryController(_:)**: Adds the specified controller of an accessory view to be presented in the page setup panel.
- **accessoryControllers**: An array of accessory view controllers belonging to the page layout panel.
